column1: Where does the God reside in our mind. This is a question asked by a devotee. He wants to know where the God will reside when our body falls. At that time whether god will shift his place.
God in our mind is as wide as the sky. He neither comes from anywhere nor goes to anywhere. He is always there. Nothing exists in this world without him.
Whatever atoms and molecules are present everywhere there is no space without him. He who looks at him is merged with him. Now there is no scope for any differentiation.

Lord is like the sky. If we remeber him then we get detached from the world. Our conscious rises above the level of sensual pleasures after looking at him. There cannot be any separation from him thereafter.
The sky covers the universe. Lord is all-pervading spirit. Therefore we cannot compare him with the sky.
God is always in existence. He is boundless. He cannot be understood through logic. A preceptor can merge us with the God.
He who realises Lord finds him in existence everywhere.
Now there is no relevance of 'I' and 'You'. A person who realises Lord sees him everywhere.
We are told the secret about the God. But we should strive for realisation of God. Let us associate with good people to make our existence worthwhile.
Let us have detachment for the world. Let us associate with good people with full honour. Good association will end our sorrows. Good association will keep us on the right track.
Good association results in detachment from the world. Good association leads to salvation.
Let us remove impurities of our mind by listening to the verses for mind. Let us transform our conscious that is dull into an alert one. Let us gain knowledge
column2: detachment to the world and ability of mind by listening to the verses for mind. Let us follow the royal path for attaining salvation.
